<h3 id="X31828">X(31828) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: INNER-GARCIA AND X3-ABC REFLECTIONS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^5-(b-c)^2*a^4-(b+c)*(2*b^2-3*b*c+2*c^2)*a^3+2*(b^4-b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^2+(b^3+c^3)*(b-c)^2*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31828) = 7*X(5)-6*X(3833) = 3*X(381)-2*X(5885) = 3*X(381)-X(15071) = 2*X(548)-3*X(10176) = X(1657)-3*X(5692) = 3*X(1699)-2*X(6583) = 6*X(3740)-5*X(31447) = 5*X(3843)-3*X(5902) = 4*X(3850)-3*X(5883) = 7*X(3851)-5*X(15016) = 3*X(5587)-2*X(13145) = 3*X(5694)-2*X(31806) = 3*X(5886)-2*X(26201) = 3*X(5927)-2*X(9956) = 2*X(9943)-3*X(11231) = X(9961)-3*X(26446) = 4*X(10107)-7*X(18480) = 3*X(10247)-4*X(26088) = 3*X(12688)+X(14872) = 3*X(31803)-X(31806)</b>
<p>X(31828) lies on these lines:
{2,17653}, {3,7701}, {4,2771}, {5,3833}, {30,5694}, {65,18513}, {72,28146}, {381,5885}, {382,517}, {411,3652}, {546,5884}, {548,10176}, {550,20117}, {581,8143}, {758,3627}, {912,22793}, {942,1898}, {971,1001}, {1158,10225}, {1482,7993}, {1657,5692}, {1699,6583}, {1709,26285}, {1864,31794}, {2392,5876}, {2772,6102}, {2801,22791}, {3065,14804}, {3579,5777}, {3740,31447}, {3843,5902}, {3850,5883}, {3851,15016}, {3878,28186}, {5587,13145}, {5658,26487}, {5663,31825}, {5787,12666}, {5886,26201}, {5887,28160}, {5927,6937}, {6001,10107}, {6894,16116}, {6906,16138}, {6909,10308}, {6914,26202}, {6917,16127}, {7489,16132}, {7957,28202}, {8728,16120}, {9856,24680}, {9943,11231}, {9961,26446}, {10247,26088}, {10269,12684}, {10284,12672}, {11230,13369}, {12290,30438}, {12528,12699}, {12680,15178}, {13391,31817}, {13630,15049}, {14110,28168}, {14988,31673}, {15726,31837}, {15934,30290}, {18483,24475}, {19526,31666}, {31730,31835}</p>
<p>
X(31828) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {382, 5693}, {5787, 12666}, {12528, 12699}<br>
X(31828) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (550, 20117), (3579, 5777), (5694, 31803), (5884, 546), (10284, 12672), (12680, 15178), (15071, 5885), (24475, 18483), (24680, 9856), (31730, 31835)<br>
X(31828) = {X(381), X(15071)}-harmonic conjugate of X(5885)<br>
</p>
